thread.title: Pirates top Cardinals 8-2 in Game 1 of doubleheader
thread.title_full: Pirates top Cardinals 8-2 in Game 1 of doubleheader

title: Pirates top Cardinals 8-2 in Game 1 of doubleheader
text:
> Top News Pirates top Cardinals 8-2 in Game 1 of doubleheader Pittsburgh Pirates starting pitcher Gerrit Cole delivers in the first inning of a baseball game against the St. Louis Cardinals in Pittsburgh, Wednesday, Sept. 30, 2015. (AP Photo/Gene J. Puskar) iWitness7 is your chance to join the News Center 7 team! Upload your videos and photos and share with the entire WHIO-TV community!
